command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user CNKdwDCmXxkMRsi.root --database HGQz9dLDHpFFWknD7bvAQD --execute SELECT * FROM site_settings;

rows.label: Customer Count Base
rows.description: Base number of happy customers (increments weekly)

rows.label: Customer Count Start Date

rows.label: Weekly Customer Increment
rows.description: Number of customers added each Monday

rows.label: Trial Period Text
rows.description: Text displayed for the trial period (e.g., "30-Night Trial")

rows.label: Guarantee Text
rows.description: Text displayed for the money-back guarantee
